name: Addroid
overview:
Addroid is an automated, web-based platform that streamlines the production of in-banner video ads while dramatically reducing their cost. With Addroid, advertisers can create in-banner video ads for less than half of what it costs to create and serve traditional rich media ads (15 cents CPM vs. 40 cents CPM).

The Addroid platform allows advertisers to build a video banner ad in as little as 30 seconds and eliminates the need to hand-code in Flash which saves time and money in the production process. And instead of having to â€œreinvent the wheelâ€ for a display campaign, Addroid allows advertisers to use their broadcast-quality video online, helping to maintain brand consistency and a high-quality experience across all platforms.

Founded in 2010, Addroid is a privately-held company based in Los Angeles.
